channel.title: DOCUMENTATION on recops
channel.description: Recent content in DOCUMENTATION on recops

item.title: Installation
item.description: recops developed on x64 Linux box using Python version 3.10.2. Is expected to work flawlessly on every linux box with Python versions above 3.7. In order to run on other systems we suggest to use the Dockerized version.

item.title: Functionality
item.description: In this page we walk through recops core design and functionality. recops is mainly a command-line interface (CLI) toolkit and well documented, use --help to get description of each function and the available options.

item.title: Encrypt your data
item.description: Any work that holds sensitive data should protect them from prying eyes. Data protection is a huge subject and there is no single solution to fit everything, so this guide doesn’t suggest that will cover everything but give some suggestions.
